tophersmith.security.headers.csp

Class CSPValidationReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • tophersmith.security.headers.csp.CSPValidationReport

  • public class CSPValidationReport
extends Object
    The CSPValidationReport holds errors and warnings related to validation of the CSP directives. In these reports, Errors denote issues with the directives that indicate a directive is incorrect and will not work if sent - e.g. the directive's value is not parseable. Warnings denote issues with the directives that indicate a directive is not accurate, but can still be sent with the intended outcome intact - e.g. the directive name is unknown.
    Author:
    Chris Smith
